problem_text: (Yu. I. Merzlyakov). Is the group of all automorphisms of the free group Fn that act trivially on Fn/[Fn, Fn] linear for n ⩾ 3? V. G. Bardakov
answer: No, it is not: for n ⩾ 5 (A. Pettet, Cohomology of some subgroups of the automorphism group of a free group, Ph.D. Thesis, 2006), and for n ⩾ 3 (V. G. Bardakov, R. Mikhailov, Commun. Algebra, 36, no. 4 (2008), 1489–1499).
